post.body: Connect Twitter to post on FB with a widget, set up FB and Myspace 2 e-mail u only whn u get a msg, then check ur profiles.
Happy holidays!
That's great news to learn! Happy Festivus!
You can always be a Toys "R" Us kid! Adults are just kids who owe more money!
we'll miss you! Happy holidays!
Nice promotion! Happy holidays!
glad to hear you enjoyed the service on 6pm. Happy shopping!
Are you in the office today?
Are you singing songs in your head again or are these your thoughts I'm guessing? LOL
That means they were never your friend to begin with. Learn from the experience and get better at reading people.
http://twitpic.com/wmla - Watching the Nathan Burton Comedy Magic w/ @vegasbill and @24k
Going to watch magic show tonight. This should be fun, plus the tickets were free.
Finished recording holiday video message to friends on Facebook. Great tool to broadcast to people in network.
Merry Christmas to all that celebrate! May the season bring you joy, happiness, and good health!
Merry Christmas to those who celebrate!
The two for one coupons in the newspaper really brought a lot of people to the buffet.
Wow... the buffet line at the casino is huge. I guess a lot of people don't want to cook on Christmas eve.
Still working... A lot of people already left the office.
The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing. - Walt Disney
Happy holidays everyone!
